title: Motion Systems
description: Motion systems consisting of mechanical, fluid and electrical components are analyzed, modeled, and controlled. Alternatives are considered for system optimization.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: ME 3015 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or ME 3017 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or AE 3515 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D
